snippet: Despite a stroke left her partially paralyzed, Marianela Toro has kept her spirits high, with the help of a sister and a nephew.
abstract: Catholic Charities Archdiocese of New York helps Marianela Toro of the Bronx, who is recovering from a paralyzing stroke, pay her back rent.
lead_paragraph: Despite a stroke left her partially paralyzed, Marianela Toro has kept her spirits high, with the help of a sister and a nephew.

headline.print_headline: After a Stroke, Living in a Bronx Apartment Filled With Bickering, Pranks and Love
headline.seo: After Stroke, Living in a Home Filled With Bickering, and Love
headline.main: After Stroke, Living in a Home Filled With Bickering, and Love
